message: This offer prioritizes me getting a larger share early on due to the inflation affecting your gains more than mine.
Alice, my turn.  Let's be reasonable. This offer gives me a slight advantage to offset the inflation, but it's still a good deal for you.
Bob, let's be realistic. The value of the money is decreasing rapidly for you. This is a fair offer considering the circumstances.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  Any further delay hurts me more than you, and frankly, a fair deal is better than none at all.
